invoice.empty: For the selected period nothing can be billed.
invoice.billable: For the selected period {{amount}} can be billed, i.e. {{hours}}.
invoice.billable_period: For the selected period {{amount}} can be billed, i.e. {{hours}} or {{ratio}} of the budget.
invoice.budget: {{amount}} will have been invoiced, i.e. {{ratio}} of the budget.
